definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

pinyin: gu3 ji3 zhui1 dong4 wu4 xue2

sentences.english: In zoology, the giant panda is Carnivora.
sentences.chinese: 在动物学上，大熊猫属食肉目。

sentences.english: Ma Jinsheng, a zoology expert, visited the zoo in Tengzhou on March 26.
sentences.chinese: 3月26日，动物学专家马金生教授来到滕州动物园。

sentences.english: I am a zoologist and the naked ape is an animal.
sentences.chinese: 我是动物学家，裸猿又是一种动物。

sentences.english: Zoologically speaking, human beings belong firmly among the monkeys and apes.
sentences.chinese: 在动物学中，人类与猿猴和无尾猿被划为一类。

sentences.english: This guess was questioned by zoologists as follows.
sentences.chinese: 这一猜测遭到动物学家的质疑。

sentences.english: The results of the study were publishedin the Journal of Zoology.
sentences.chinese: 这起研究的结果在《动物学杂质》中刊登出来。

sentences.english: A zoologist attempts to capture a northern gannet affected by the oil spill.
sentences.chinese: 一个动物学家企图捕捉沾染漏油的北方塘鹅。

sentences.english: Zoologically speaking, human beings belong firmly among the ­monkeys and apes.
sentences.chinese: 在动物学中，人类与猿猴和无尾猿被划为一类。

sentences.english: This site is a complex information resource on paleontological and zoological classification.
sentences.chinese: 此站点提供有关古生物学和动物学分类的信息资源。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-oxidation effects of soy isoflavone .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨大豆异黄酮抗氧化动物学效应。

sentences.english: It is now a source of growing interest for chemists and zoologists as well.
sentences.chinese: 它现在也是化学家和动物学家愈感兴趣的一个所在。

sentences.english: This is the website for Food and Nutritional Science, University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 这是香港大学动物学系食品与营养科学研究组的网站。

sentences.english: Zoologists also make a distinction between great apes and lesser apes.
sentences.chinese: 动物学家们又把猿分为大猿和小猿。
